theCatGirl:TrainedRelic.NAME: Trained
theCatGirl:TrainedRelic.FLAVOR: An adventurer never takes the same attack twice.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you take damage, gain 2 Evade.

theCatGirl:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2

theCatGirl:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
